name: Heroic Defender GoFalcon
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to hit the fireballs on the matching arrow button

Mouse to select Start and Continue buttons

Game may take a second to load🤖

Joe Hanada is a fearsome delinquent turned mech pilot.

Use your lightning fast reflexes to defeat the demon horde in this rhythm game.

Beat all 4 stages to see the thrilling conclusion of GoFalcon!

All assets made during the jam period by:

Isaac LaRussa: Art, Animation, Concept, Opening/Ending Song

Hadley Richardson-O'Brien: Programming, Coloring assistance

Zucchini: 3rd stage and final stage music

Sam: 1st and 2nd stage music

Made for Mech Jam III
